    • Constructor Detail

      • CrabCatcherGame

        public CrabCatcherGame(double speed,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals,
                       int score,
                       int lives,
                       double gameLength,
                       java.awt.event.MouseAdapter mouseListener,
                       int maxAnimalsOnScreen,
                       boolean gameOver,
                       OverallGame bigGame,
                       javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Parameters:
        speed - - rate of gameplay
        animals - - array of all animals in the mini game
        score - - player's current score for this mini game
        lives - - number of lives remaining (default is 3)
        gameLength - - time limit for the game
        mouseListener - - handles mouse clicks, checks if user clicked animal
        gameOver - - whether the game should be over (default is false)
        maxAnimalsOnScreen - - the maximum number of animals that can appear onscreen
        bigGame - - the overall game that this mini game is a part of
        frame - - the frame the game is drawn in
